name: Cloudsoft Corporation
tag_list: cloud-computing, cloud-management, multicloud-management, iaas, paas, public-cloud, private-cloud, hybrid-cloud, jclouds, brooklyn, whirr, multicloud-application-management
overview:
Cloudsoft is a software company specialising in multi-cloud application management, using open-source tools to form an Application Management Platform.

Cloudsoft provides comprehensive professional open source support and services, actively sponsoring established open source projects such as Apache Whirr and jclouds.

Whirr and jclouds together with Cloudsoft’s brooklyn (an open source control plane) form the basis of Cloudsoftâ€™s Application Management Platform. This supported open source platform enables enterprises to develop, deploy and manage large-scale distributed applications at lower cost, reduced complexity and minimal risk while avoiding vendor lock-in.

Headquartered in the UK and venture funded, Cloudsoft is led by seasoned executives backed by experienced open source leadership and a world-class advisory board.
